nodes.text: Shalla was a colony of Altiri, on the moon of Priva, named after a goddess of peace worshipped early in Altiri history.

Shalla was founded in 500 BBY by the Altiri and was the first off-planet colonization of Altiria/Anarris history. It was originally a research station and eventually became a starport for receiving offworld visitors. Because of the never-ending conflict of the Altiri against the Anarrian, the colony transformed into a defense station.
